tutorials.title: Database Cloud Services Workshop for OCI Lab Introduction
Lab 1: Introduction and Setup
tutorials.description: Create services and setup account for workshop

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Zero Downtime Database Migration
tutorials.description: Use a simple automated one button approach to move your oracle database to the Oracle Cloud

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Tablespace, Schema and Table Migration Use Cases
tutorials.description: Explore some common use cases for moving your data from on-premise to the cloud

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Data Recovery using the Command Line Interface to manage DBCS instances
tutorials.description: Recover lost data and use the Command Line Interface (CLI) to manage instances
